newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Loral Space started as hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Loral Space started as hold.

text.p: --ABN AMRO-Chicago Corp analyst Kenneth Leon said he started coverage of Loral Space & Communications Ltd with a hold rating.
--Shares in the aerospace firm were up 1/4 to 14-3/8.

--"Loral SpaceCom is a premier satellite company for the 21st century. Management has a strong track record in executing projects that yield high returns. Key challenges for 1997-1998 are the start-up of Globalstar and the Skynet integration. Longer term issues that have financial risks are CyberStar and other new ventures," Leon said.
